price: Waambie walio kufuru: Karibuni mtashindwa na mtakusanywa, mtiwe kwenye Jahannam; nako huko ni makao mabaya kabisa.
arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَتُغۡلَبُونَ وَتُحۡشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waambie hawa walio kufuru: Bila ya shaka nyinyi mtashindwa hapa duniani, na kesho Akhera mtaadhibiwa. Na Jahannamu ndio itakuwa tandiko lenu la kulalia; na ovu lilioje tandiko hilo!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul lilladhīna kafarū satugh'labūna watuḥ'sharūna ilā jahannama wabi'sa al-mihādu
